chatbot

Class TouristChatbot

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatbot.TouristChatbot

  • public class TouristChatbot
extends java.lang.Object
    The tourist chatbot controls the conversation flow and accesses the different components of the application, such as NLU platform, recommender, database.
    Author:
    Jasmin Wellnitz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TouristChatbot(AgentHandler agentHandler, ImageRequester imageRequester, Recommender recommender, UserDB userDB, RatingDB ratingsDB)
      Creates the tourist chatbot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,User> getActiveUsers() 
      java.util.List<ChatbotResponse> processInput(long userId, java.lang.Object userInput)
      Handles the user input: transfers the user input to the NLU platform, checks which action needs to be taken based on the agent response and creates one or multiple chatbot responses.
      ChatbotResponse processStartMessage(long userId, java.lang.String userName)
      Processes the start message, stores the new user and overrides the old one if need be.

      • TouristChatbot

        public TouristChatbot(AgentHandler agentHandler,
                      ImageRequester imageRequester,
                      Recommender recommender,
                      UserDB userDB,
                      RatingDB ratingsDB)
        Creates the tourist chatbot
        Parameters:
        agentHandler - the NLU platform agent handler
        imageRequester - the image handler, in this case Foursquare
        recommender - the recommender
        userDB - the user database
        ratingsDB - the ratings database
